channel.title: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
channel.description:
[code][5/5/12 11:38 PM]: Initilizing Pkz... [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: java.net.BindEx ception: Address already in use: bind [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:344) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Net.java:336) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(ServerSocketC hannelImpl.java:199) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(ServerSocketAdapt or.java:74) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [5/5/12 11:38 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code]
Anyone help me with this error?:s

item.title: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

@echo off title Client java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pauseTry that. If that doesn’t work, post your Jframe.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“All Time Low, post:9, topic:441482”]Restarted my pc, no difference.
Let me try what the mod said.

Edit: Theirs like 5 differen’t ports.
43596,43594,43595,5556,80. :\

Edit: Alright i fixed it myslef by commenting out some shit in server.java for the run.bat to run without or requierments.
But now my client doesn’t load… just saying “press anything to continue” and i know im using the right java ect to run the client.[/quote]Post your run.bat. Are you sure your running your run.bat and not your compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Close all running java processes, and anything that could be listening to the port.

If nothing else, try putting in a different port number (random) and see if you still get the error.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

You already have the server open in another cmd.

The error explained is the server binds on port 43594, and since you already have the server open and binded in another cmd it can’t bind to the port.

Just close all other cmds running the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Me with This Run.Bat Error!
